issue.title: [CF 978] Healthstone Charges Not Updating
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Conjure a healthstone
2. (or) consume a healthstone charge
3.

What do you expect to happen?
In combat: icon should appear when at 0 healthstone stacks.
Out of combat: icon should appear when at < 3 healthstone stacks.

What happens instead?
Does not appear out of combat when at 1 or 2 stacks.
Using /tmw to toggle configuration on and off causes an update.
After forcing it to show via /tmw, conjuring a new healthstone (changing stacks from 1/2 to 3) does not cause the icon to disappear.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.0.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No.

comments.body:
Also, the icon does not show healthstone charges as stacks, as expected (as the "#showtooltip Healthstone" icon does).


> Posted by CurseForge user M0dusPwnens

Fixed in g081ef43

It doesn't show stacks because you are using a condition icon. Use an Item Cooldown icon (and enable the "Show stacks" setting on it) if you want it to show you the stacks.
